channel.title: Would This Be A Useful Program?
channel.description:
Well The Title Says it all so here is an image:
[img]http://s15.postimg.org/jjld8slmj/useful.png[/img]
So Basicly If You Cant Tell What It will do is find and download a source for you instead of searching everywhere to find it or simply checking the download list :D if ima make it im gunna be adding tons of sources to it so tell me do you think it will be useful?

item.title: Would This Be A Useful Program?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:19, topic:527671”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=646423.msg4348145#msg4348145 date=1376216416]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=646423.msg4348135#msg4348135 date=1376213817]

Honestly if I wasn’t such a lazy webdev, OP and I probably could set up a website together for this.
[/quote]I may already be working on it

Do it. Post in the web section, I want to see progress.
[/quote]Progress threads demotivate me. Give it a little bit

I strongly encourage you to go all out with this website, if you’re going to make it. Include everyone anyone may need to start a private server. Have a section to help with port-forwarding, have a section with top website hosts, top VPS companies, etc. Just feature-pack the shit out of it. Give it anything someone might need to start a site.[/quote]SEO for days. Great ideas, my dude.

[quote=“Vain_, post:20, topic:527671”]and add a shitload of ads for the monies[/quote]At least to cover booze money, like Mopar does.

Read full topic
item.source: Would This Be A Useful Program?

item.title: Would This Be A Useful Program?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I think it’s a good idea. It would be better as a website, but it wouldn’t matter either way since you’re going to end up downloading material one way or another. One thing that would make it cool is narrow searches through any field. For example, you choose the revision and a list of all the bases show up. However, if you start with the listed bases, then all the available revisions would show up. Stuff like that is super cool.

Read full topic
item.source: Would This Be A Useful Program?

item.title: Would This Be A Useful Program?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

A5vj9IY.png800×798

Here’s a generic mock up of how the site would look (imo). Of course it isn’t near good or anything. But it’s an idea, the nav bar would have search functions, and lyou could like narrow what you’re looking for by specific source, base, revision, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Would This Be A Useful Program?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

The Web Guy:

The thought is cool, I think you need a bigger list though, have the list and links updated from a server-side location, so you can update it regularly and prune dead links. Also the design could use some work.

What he said, don’t hardcore the links in the program. One possible way of doing this would be hosting an XML file and grab all the elements/attributes that hold the data and display it on the program, this has the advantages of being able to fix links, and even add more sources without forcing people to update the program.

Read full topic
item.source: Would This Be A Useful Program?
